name: withConfigProvider
signature: { (provider: ConfigProvider): <A, E, R>(self: Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A, E, R>; <A, E, R>(self: Effect<A, E, R>, provider: ConfigProvider): Effect<A, E, R>; }
description:
Executes an effect using a specific configuration provider.
*Details This function lets you run an effect with a specified configuration provider.
The custom provider will override the default configuration provider for the
duration of the effect's execution.
*When to Use This is particularly useful when you need to use a different set of
configuration values or sources for specific parts of your application.
*Example
